title: The Rescue
description:
Tig and Cheryl kick off 2022 with "The Rescue," the thrilling and inspiring story of the cave rescue of a Thai boys' soccer team! It's an amazing and hilarious episode of the show, as the film turns out to be one of the doc duos' favorites to date! *this episode spills beans* get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
